events: SB-03 advancement to 18 ft bgs, split spoon samples collected at 2-ft intervals
MW-02 purge: 3 well volumes removed, clarity <5 NTU (nephelometric) before sampling
GAC vessel A backwash completed, 15 minutes at 22 gpm
episodes.notes: Day 1 remediation monitoring. PAT system treating 44.0 gpm. SVE operating at 85 scfm. All systems nominal.

events: Soil boring SB-06 abandoned and grouted per state regulations
Air stripper packing material inspection: no fouling observed
Weekly pump runtime log: RW-01 at 156 hrs, RW-02 at 160 hrs
episodes.notes: Day 2 remediation monitoring. PAT system treating 41.5 gpm. SVE operating at 88 scfm. All systems nominal.

events: MW-04 dedicated bladder pump replaced after 18 months service
SVE blower belt tension adjusted, vibration within spec
Quarterly groundwater elevation survey completed all 6 wells
episodes.notes: Day 3 remediation monitoring. PAT system treating 47.0 gpm. SVE operating at 91 scfm. All systems nominal.

events: PAT system influent totalizer reading: 1,842,600 gallons cumulative
Soil gas probe SG-02 resealed after surface settlement
Health and safety tailgate meeting: heat stress prevention review
episodes.notes: Day 4 remediation monitoring. PAT system treating 44.5 gpm. SVE operating at 94 scfm. All systems nominal.

events: MW-01 well cap lock replaced, tamper seal intact
Thermal oxidizer burner maintenance: nozzle cleaned, flame pattern verified
Stormwater BMP inspection: silt fence intact around excavation area
episodes.notes: Day 5 remediation monitoring. PAT system treating 50.0 gpm. SVE operating at 97 scfm. All systems nominal.

events: SB-07 PID screening: 85 ppm at 12 ft, 42 ppm at 16 ft
GAC vessel B carbon sample collected for iodine number testing
Generator fuel level: 340 gallons, 14-day supply at current consumption
episodes.notes: Day 6 remediation monitoring. PAT system treating 47.5 gpm. SVE operating at 100 scfm. All systems nominal.

events: MW-03 sampling: low-flow technique, stabilization criteria met at 12 min
SVE extraction well EW-04 flow rate optimized from 15 to 18 scfm
Equipment decontamination: Alconox wash followed by DI rinse per SOP
episodes.notes: Day 7 remediation monitoring. PAT system treating 53.0 gpm. SVE operating at 103 scfm. All systems nominal.

events: Confirmation soil samples collected from excavation floor at grid points
Air permit compliance: thermal oxidizer stack test within limits
Monitoring well development: MW-06 surged and pumped, 200 gallons removed
episodes.notes: Day 8 remediation monitoring. PAT system treating 50.5 gpm. SVE operating at 85 scfm. All systems nominal.

events: SB-04 soil classification: sandy clay with petroleum odor at 10-14 ft interval
